about_the_game:
Blood Punk is a hyper violent fast-paced retro FPS where you must exchange your health for bullets.

Eviscerate giant abominations with the blood of an angel using deadly weapons in a dark fantasy comic book world.



The world was in balance, but the greed of a monarch led him down a treacherous path.
He ensnared an angel and exchanged it's divine ichor with his own mortal blood.

The balance was broken and the world fell into desolation.

Now it is up to Numa, scion of the deluded monarch, with celestial blood coursing through her veins, to restore the balance.



  • Eviscerate grotesque abominations
  • Choose from an arsenal of potent blood powered weapons
  • Reloading your weapon consumes your health, utilize your movement abilities to rush around the arena picking up health that explodes from damaged enemies
  • Master each encounter to complete challenges to earn a high rank and unlock upgraded weapons and abilities

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of violence and gore.
